content.title: RuneScape Investing API Calculator
content.description: Developed a Flask-based interface that interacts with the Old School RuneScape (OSRS) real-time prices API. This calculator allows users to query the latest price information for in-game items, facilitating profitable buying and selling strategies. The project integrates web-scraped item icons with API data, presenting a user-friendly interface that displays crucial information such as instantaneous buy/sell prices, profit margins, ROI, and the recency of transactions. This tool streamlines the process of identifying lucrative in-game investment opportunities.

infoBoxes.title: Technologies
infoBoxes.content: Python, Flask, OSRS API, NumPy, Time, Typing, Math, Statistics, Collections

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Real-time price tracking, Profit margin calculation, ROI analysis, Transaction recency display

infoBoxes.title: Backend
infoBoxes.content: Utilizes various API endpoints for comprehensive market data
